1237910.name: Legion's Crawl 2 Demo
1237910.description:
This is a free demo of Legion's Crawl 2. You can play it for free to check what this game is/will be like, or your PC is good enough to run it. (I'm pretty sure it is though!)
And of course, if you have some ideas or find problems, tell me and you can improve the final product!

In the demo, you can challenge the first dungeon, which is the easiest of three available in the release version. The demo is also missing the Upgrade feature, which will enable you to buy advantages before you enter the dungeons.

The release version will get more items, skills, enemies, and features which may not be included in the demo.
1237910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
